医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明，运动的一些有益作用可能是由免疫系统驱动的自从 20 世纪早期的一项研究显示波士顿马拉松运动员赛后血液中的白细胞激增以来，运动与炎症之间的联系一直吸引着研究人员的想象力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Some-beneficial-effects-of-exercise-may-be-driven-by-the-immune-system-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Some-beneficial-effects-of-exercise-may-be-driven-by-the-immune-system-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7851b23f-bc0a-4f44-ab05-afa1f19db215 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 14:45:00 -0400 Some beneficial effects of exercise may be driven by the immune system, study suggests
受蝴蝶启发的成像传感器可以高精度检测癌细胞我们的星球上有许多生物比人类拥有更先进的感官。海龟可以感知地球的磁场。螳螂虾可以检测偏振光。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Butterfly-inspired-imaging-sensor-can-detect-cancer-cells-with-high-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Butterfly-inspired-imaging-sensor-can-detect-cancer-cells-with-high-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d30e6499-e395-41eb-a332-33e59eb87080 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 14:38:00 -0400 Butterfly-inspired imaging sensor can detect cancer cells with high accuracy
研究：自大流行以来，疗养院受到就业下降的不利影响最大密歇根大学的一位研究人员表示，在医疗保健工作领域中，自大流行以来，疗养院受到就业增长下降的不利影响最严重，其影响程度是医院或医生办公室的三倍多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Study-Nursing-homes-most-adversely-affected-by-employment-declines-since-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Study-Nursing-homes-most-adversely-affected-by-employment-declines-since-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c13ab81c-45aa-4ee6-bf3b-e20da7d2ad19 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 14:05:00 -0400 Study: Nursing homes most adversely affected by employment declines since the pandemic
美国牙科阿片类药物处方量下降，但大流行减缓了进展2023 年 11 月 3 日密歇根大学的一项研究显示，如今在美国接受拔牙或其他痛苦牙科手术的美国人获得阿片类止痛药的可能性远低于几年前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Dental-opioid-prescribing-declines-in-the-US-but-pandemic-slows-progressNovember-3-2023.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Dental-opioid-prescribing-declines-in-the-US-but-pandemic-slows-progressNovember-3-2023.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30626659-9f05-48d9-ab2d-963f4f401b9e Fri, 03 Nov 2023 13:59:00 -0400 Dental opioid prescribing declines in the U.S., but pandemic slows progressNovember 3, 2023
WFIRM 宣布成功续签其本科生研究经验网站补助金维克森林再生医学研究所 (WFIRM) 很高兴地宣布美国国家科学基金会 (NSF) 成功续签其本科生研究经验 (REU) 站点资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/WFIRM-announces-successful-renewal-of-its-Research-Experiences-for-Undergraduates-Site-grant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/WFIRM-announces-successful-renewal-of-its-Research-Experiences-for-Undergraduates-Site-grant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97cf4a02-30be-4ddb-9298-86357f0e2cc5 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 13:53:00 -0400 WFIRM announces successful renewal of its Research Experiences for Undergraduates Site grant
新技术有助于“可视化”活胚胎组织内的渗透压为了生存，生物体必须控制其内部的压力，从单细胞水平到组织和器官。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/New-technique-helps-visualize-osmotic-Pressure-within-living-embryonic-tissues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/New-technique-helps-visualize-osmotic-Pressure-within-living-embryonic-tissues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd6cc085-cbb3-4e03-8e8e-b3c9409b0967 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 13:48:00 -0400 New technique helps 'visualize' osmotic pressure within living embryonic tissues
研究人员开创了一种治疗最常见自身免疫性脑炎的新疗法DZNE 和柏林夏里特医学大学的研究人员开创了一种治疗最常见自身免疫性脑炎的新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Researchers-pioneer-a-novel-treatment-for-the-most-common-autoimmune-encephalitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Researchers-pioneer-a-novel-treatment-for-the-most-common-autoimmune-encephalitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43b4e9aa-ee8f-418c-a1d5-bcb53cb57c22 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 13:41:00 -0400 Researchers pioneer a novel treatment for the most common autoimmune encephalitis
营养与衰老：双向关系随着媒体对神奇饮食和营养补充剂的大肆宣传，人们总是忍不住想要寻找一种以食物为基础的灵丹妙药，以增加人们过上更长寿、更健康生活的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Nutrition-and-aging-A-two-way-relationship.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Nutrition-and-aging-A-two-way-relationship.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9eb3e190-b6dc-4adc-b622-16c4ae440266 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 13:29:00 -0400 Nutrition and aging: A two-way relationship
AI 模型计算骨肉瘤患者的坏死百分比，准确率高达 99%约翰霍普金斯大学医学院的一个研究团队创建并训练了一个机器学习模型来计算坏死百分比 (PN) -；或者，肿瘤“死亡”且不再活跃的百分比是多少？骨肉瘤（一种骨癌）患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/AI-model-calculates-percent-necrosis-in-osteosarcoma-病人-with-9925-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/AI-model-calculates-percent-necrosis-in-osteosarcoma-病人-with-9925-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee382d48-69e2-401b-bbd0-392fe00e946d Fri, 03 Nov 2023 13:23:00 -0400 AI model calculates percent necrosis in osteosarcoma patients with 99% accuracy
Sparsentan可能是局灶节段性肾小球硬化症的新治疗选择局灶节段性肾小球硬化症 (FSGS) 是一种罕见的肾脏疾病，影响儿童和成人，并可能导致肾衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Sparsentan-may-be-a-new-treatment-option-for-focal-segmental-glomerulosclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Sparsentan-may-be-a-new-treatment-option-for-focal-segmental-glomerulosclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08f27075-6d16-4d46-9283-3d533da729fb Fri, 03 Nov 2023 13:17:00 -0400 Sparsentan may be a new treatment option for focal segmental glomerulosclerosis
